title: New update sucks and it is lagging af
body: Fix it asap it is getting on nerves.

replies.body: Yeah, I'm downloading the patch as well. ETA 80 minutes.... I just went on to steam to download something to see if it was my provider. 3.2 GB download ETA 4 Minutes...
Would love to help you out here, but I need more info on what exactly is happening.  Where are you lagging, and what's happening?  Are there any error messages?  Thanks!

I don't know what OP's issue is but my download to update this patch is INCREDIBLY slow, considering that I have pretty decent download speed I'm rather stumped as to what would be causing this issue.

This patch shouldn't take 80 minutes to download.
welcome to riot games, the company that has done nothing to fix the game in 7 years, dont expect any actual help
